item.title: How stress and pressure can change our lives for the better
item.description: Tensions became a common feature in the 21st century, causing a mental health crisis, and science suggests that it affected unborn babies. In contrast, psychologists are keen to teach us that there is some kind of good, healthy and even fruitful tension.
